name: Jennifer Martinez
message: I'm interested in learning more about your teacher training program. Could you provide more details about the curriculum and schedule?

name: Robert Kim
message: Do you offer private sessions? I'm recovering from a back injury and would like personalized instruction.

name: Lisa Thompson
message: I'd love to host a corporate wellness workshop at my company. Can we discuss options and pricing?

name: Carlos Ruiz
message: What are your COVID safety protocols? I want to make sure I feel comfortable returning to in-person classes.
